DOC.brief_summary: A multi-centers , placebo-controlled , randomize , double-blinded , pilot clinical trial design evaluate safety DA-3030 injection explore efficacy Neuropathic pain .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety DA-3030 Explore Efficacy Diabetic Neuropathic Pain
DOC.criteria: 20≤ Age ≤ 70 Diagnosed Type I Type II diabetes HbA1c ≤ 11 % Patients diabetic neuropathic pain least 3 month Patients corresponding average pain level 4 point mor 24 hour evaluate 11point Likert scale Neuropathic pain due cause Another strong pain neuropathic pain Abnormality blood pressure , weight Positive reaction HIV , HBV HCV A medical history mental illness within 6 month The grade BDI ( Beck Depression Inventory ) exceed 21 point History drug/alcohol abuse
